name: Lavica Ann "Vicie" Curlee
bio: Lavica Ann "Vicie" Curlee was born on 4 July 1835, in South Carolina, United States. She had at least 3 sons and 2 daughters with William Mathison Bennett. She lived in Election Precinct 8 Jamestown, Conecuh, Alabama, United States in 1900. She died on 9 June 1924, in Covington, Alabama, United States, at the age of 88, and was buried in Bethel Primitive Baptist Church Cemetery, Babbie, Covington, Alabama, United States.
